entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
